hero.title: Transform Your Future with Digital Skills

features.title: Why Choose SkillBridge254?

aiAssessment.title: AI-Powered Assessment
aiAssessment.description: Our platform uses artificial intelligence to evaluate your skills and guide you with personalized learning paths.

offline.title: Learn Anywhere
offline.description: Study even without internet connection. Your content stays on your device for offline learning.

businessTools.title: Business Tools
businessTools.description: Get modern tools to manage your business - accounting, customers, and payments.

personalized.title: Personalized Training
personalized.description: Everyone gets training that fits their current skill level and learning pace.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Future?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of youth in Kiharu who are building better lives through digital skills. Start your journey today - it's completely free!
